DOC.brief_summary: Photosensitivity of the skin to UVA and UVB will be determined
DOC.brief_title: Photosensitivity of the Skin Under Azathioprin in Renal Transplant Recipients
DOC.detailed_description: Photosensitivity of the skin to UVA and UVB in renal transplant recipients with and without azathioprine will be determined. Azathioprine will be discontinued and photosensitivity determined after a wash-out period of three months - Trial with medicinal product
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Renal transplant recipients under azathioprin Exclusion criteria: Treatment with Prograf (Tacrolimus)
